title: Those Athenes Buffs tho

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - Today' s Patch out but the PBE still down ] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
Well, thats amazing actually.

Thank you based rito gods. 

Morello not being number one is a buff to all champions who rely on healing in all forms, and is also offers more diversity in items.

Shit, I even see this is a blanket buff to Galio.  

Now you actually choose.

"Do I take morello's for the grevious wounds and more AP, or Athenes for MR and Mana Resets"


Edit: Changes for anyone scared of links and what not

**Athene's Unholy Grail**


*Mana regen increased to 100% from 50%*

*Unique Passive now restores 30% of maximum mana on kill/assist up from 15%*

*[Note: This change was actually added in an earlier PBE patch in this cycle but I missed documenting it! Adding it here for visibility]*

replies.body: Still useless for harass lanes, keeping morellos.
dat amumu splash is sad as fuck...

Passive from Kill/Assist increase is OK... but base Mana Regen increase??? hope they increased Mana Font instead so it's higher than Chalice... rather than increasing base Mana Regen... (but in that effect Mikael maybe should increased too... greater than both...)
Might change from Morello as first item 90% of the time to Athene's finally as Xerath. 30% mana is really good in team fights.
